context: <a0_0><b5_0>Land Forces<b5_0/><a0_0/> during this period also deployed in support of <a4_0><b8_0>peacekeeping<b8_0/><a4_0/> operations within United Nations sanctioned conflicts. The nature of the Canadian Forces has continued to evolve. They have been deployed in Afghanistan until <a1_0><b6_0>2011<b6_0/><a1_0/>, under the NATO-led United Nations International Security Assistance Force (<a2_0><b7_0>ISAF<b7_0/><a2_0/>), at the request of <a3_0>the Government of Afghanistan<a3_0/>.
